summary:
AWS Savings Plans are a financial construct that commit you to using a certain configuration of instances over a time period, in exchange for a discount. 
The post The Duckbill Guide to AWS Savings Plans appeared first on Last Week in AWS.
title: The Duckbill Guide to AWS Savings Plans

summary:
AWS Reserved Instances are a financial construct to save money on various services by pre-committing to the usage. 
The post The Duckbill Guide to AWS Reserved Instances appeared first on Last Week in AWS.
title: The Duckbill Guide to AWS Reserved Instances

summary:
This morning, I think I somehow signed up to do Inktober2024 after reading Darren Hester's post.  He was asking if anyone over on Mastodon would be doing the yearly challenge and, yes, like I always do, I talked myself into doing a whole 31 days of scribbling, eh, I mean serious artwork. 
Well, they will probably be doodles for me...
title: Inktober 2024
